titleStmt.title: From the Arch-Bishop of the Isle of Samos in Greece An account of his building the Grecian church in So-hoe Feilds, and the disposal thereof by the masters of the parish of St. Martins in the Feilds.
titleStmt.author: Geōrgarinēs, Iōsēph, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
